From the south, Newport is most easily accessible using Interstate 91. Taking exits 27 or 28 will lead you into the town. From the north, take Autoroute 55 South from Quebec, and you will find Newport just a few miles after crossing the U.S./Canadian border.
- Newport is on the shoreline of the large lake and has a wooden boardwalk that can be walked or biked that leads over the water.  It is also rumored that the lake holds a lake monster, Memphre.

The Pick and Shovel is an independent hardware store turned mega-mart. You can find almost anything in this great spot--a toilet, board game, banana split, or new pet fish.

value: content=A great hamburger and sandwich place located on Newport's main street. Excellent Philadelphia and New York style food.

Lago is a wonderful Italian restaurant found on Main Street. The food is truly artisan, you won't find any overcooked baked ziti here. The salads, pizzas, and seafood are worth highlighting.
There are a few bars on Main Street which are also just a short walk away from the waterfront boardwalks near Lake Memphremagog.

value: content=Has a pool and hot tub along with an exercise facility. Rated 2 diamonds by AAA.
